publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2402.2 Mary Scanlon:Anti-Racism Strategy—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2402) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, leave out from “and flagship” to end and insert “; supports the continuing need to raise awareness of, and tackle, racism in Scotland and to celebrate our diversity; supports the range of Executive activities and actions to promote race equality including work in health, the police and education; is committed to eradicating racism in Scotland in whatever form it takes to ensure that we create an inclusive and prosperous Scotland, and believes that a fair system of immigration control is necessary in order to promote good race relations.”
